alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Plaquemines Parish through 815 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Venice, or 36 miles southeast of Port Sulphur, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Plaquemines Parish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
